tool_description: Improve your delivery rate and clean your email lists with our industry-leading email verification API
name: Email Validation and Verification

api_list.description:

optional_parameters.name: auto_correct
optional_parameters.description: You can chose to disable auto correct. To do so, just input  **false** for the auto correct param. By default, auto_correct is turned on.
